title: Help with this poster font?
content:
Can anyone help me identify this poster font please? I think I've got it down to Thorowgood, but I'd like to know if something similar exists with the drop shadow and inside etching?

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818143815im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eine-9_m_4964.jpg)
author: smallfish

comments.content: This is some sort of Bodoni Poster "inlined/engraved". The closest I have is [Battista Stroke](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818143815/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/preusstype/battista).
